quotes: I was CEO of Unilever between 2009-19. Working with a tremendous team, we showed that responsible business models can go hand-in-hand with strong performance, raising top and bottom line growth, outperforming the industry, and increasing shareholder returns by 290% while the company consistently ranked first in the world for sustainability and one of the best places to work.

organizations.name: University of Cincinnati
quotes: After a bachelors in economics in the Netherlands, I finished my graduate studies MA and MBA in Economics and Business in America at the University of Cincinnati.

organizations.name: Procter & Gamble
quotes: I worked for three great companies in the years that followed: Procter & Gamble, Nestle, and Unilever – all built to last.

organizations.name: Nestle
quotes: I worked for three great companies in the years that followed: Procter & Gamble, Nestle, and Unilever – all built to last.

organizations.name: Unilever
quotes: I worked for three great companies in the years that followed: Procter & Gamble, Nestle, and Unilever – all built to last.

organizations.name: United Nations
quotes: I was honoured to sit on the high-level United Nations panel which originally developed the 2030 Sustainable Development Goals.

roles.title: CEO of Unilever
quotes: I was CEO of Unilever between 2009-19. Working with a tremendous team, we showed that responsible business models can go hand-in-hand with strong performance, raising top and bottom line growth, outperforming the industry, and increasing shareholder returns by 290% while the company consistently ranked first in the world for sustainability and one of the best places to work.
I was one of six children born in the Netherlands.
After a bachelors in economics in the Netherlands, I finished my graduate studies MA and MBA in Economics and Business in America at the University of Cincinnati.
